alert.note: Alert for Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 4:07PM AKST until February 03 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Misty Fjords including Hyder. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday to 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected across the Southern Panhandle and Misty Fjords late Tuesday night through early Thursday morning. A change to rain is expected late Wednesday night through Thursday; however confidence remains low on the exact timing of the transition to rain. An earlier or later transition to rain could greatly impact snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
